channel.title: School of Survival : How To Survive A Zombie Apocalypse
channel.description: The School of Survival are back! Season 4 of the popular survival podcast will return on 24th July 2013 with all new discussions, simulations and survival tips from around the world. This time, though, they need a new member! Can you help them decide who will be the newest addition to the team? . We will save your life. Brain Destruction Is Guaranteed.... Don't Stop Be Living. Season 3 and Season 2 simulations also available for download.

image.title: School of Survival : How To Survive A Zombie Apocalypse

channel.itunes:author: After Dark
channel.itunes:summary: The School of Survival are back! Season 4 of the popular survival podcast will return on 24th July 2013 with all new discussions, simulations and survival tips from around the world. This time, though, they need a new member! Can you help them decide who will be the newest addition to the team? . We will save your life. Brain Destruction Is Guaranteed.... Don't Stop Be Living.
channel.itunes:subtitle: This podcast will save your life.

item.title: 4.12 The Final Four
item.description: The last episode of season four and it's time for a decision to be made on who is to become the new superior member at the School of Survival. Who will win? Who will die? You don't decide.... we do.
item.itunes:subtitle: The last episode of season four and it's time for a decision to be made on who is to become the new superior member at the School of Survival. Who will win? Who will die? You don't decide.... we do.

item.title: 4.11 Ninjas & Knightmare
item.description: Ninjas, Seals, Seals, Park Rangers and Seals all come under scrutiny as the team look at what job would give you the best training in an apocalypse. Also, would replacing or adding limbs help you to survive a zombie attack? Plus in the final challenge the team enter the dungeon with special guest host Tregard to find out who will survive through to the final episode of the season and the final test to see who will become the new fourth at the School of Survival.
item.itunes:subtitle: Ninjas, Seals, Seals, Park Rangers and Seals all come under scrutiny as the team look at what job would give you the best training in an apocalypse. Also, would replacing or adding limbs help you to survive a zombie attack? Plus in the final challenge...

item.title: 4.10 Barking Dogs & Blockbusters
item.description: Christie joins the team once more as they discuss the unconventional uses of animals in a Zombie Apocalypse, how many zombies constitutes a horde, what can happen in a purple time rift and who exactly does Spencer think he is. Plus, this week, the challenge focuses general knowledge in a test of intelligence that has a surprising result.
item.itunes:subtitle: Christie joins the team once more as they discuss the unconventional uses of animals in a Zombie Apocalypse, how many zombies constitutes a horde, what can happen in a purple time rift and who exactly does Spencer think he is. Plus, this week, the...

item.title: 4.09 Catnadoes & Cash in the Attic
item.description: The Sharknado - could the same phenomenom happen with zombies? What's the difference between Lakes, ponds, seas and rivers? Will a spear gun help you fly and how do you pronounce Oompa Loompa are all burning questions answered in the discussion this week as Larry rejoins the team to help put the listeners' minds at rest. Plus a slight misunderstanding leads to the challenge being a little shorter than usual.
item.itunes:subtitle: The Sharknado - could the same phenomenom happen with zombies? What's the difference between Lakes, ponds, seas and rivers? Will a spear gun help you fly and how do you pronounce Oompa Loompa are all burning questions answered in the discussion this...

item.title: 4.08 Brain Freeze & Britain's Got the X Talent Voice Factor
item.description: Smoothie Bars and Charity Shops get the once over in the discussion this week as the team get specific on locations for the Stephen Keene-Elliot special. Felicity joins the team to air her opinions and in the Challenge, each contestant gets to showcase their own speciality talent that could make them the perfect new addition to the School of Survival.
item.itunes:subtitle: Smoothie Bars and Charity Shops get the once over in the discussion this week as the team get specific on locations for the Stephen Keene-Elliot special. Felicity joins the team to air her opinions and in the Challenge, each contestant gets to...

item.title: 4.07 Lightning, Leprosy & Love Island
item.description: World War Z - would the plan actually work? Optimum weather conditions for despatching the undead and the lack of survival training in our education system are just some of the topics up for discussion today as Tyler rejoins the team to help answer your questions. Plus, our contestants are put to the test in the jungle this week as a previous challenger makes a surprising return.
item.itunes:subtitle: World War Z - would the plan actually work? Optimum weather conditions for despatching the undead and the lack of survival training in our education system are just some of the topics up for discussion today as Tyler rejoins the team to help answer...

item.title: 4.06 Fir Trees & Funhouse
item.description: Would a tree house keep you safe from the undead and if so where should you build it and what kind of tree should you use? Also, as well as Dr Dale's Zombie Dictionary are there any other none survival books that you should read in order to prepare for the inevitable? These are the questions that are answered in today's discussion with a very special inanimate guest. Plus our contestants take on Pat Sharp and Tristen's Gunge in this week's challenge.
item.itunes:subtitle: Would a tree house keep you safe from the undead and if so where should you build it and what kind of tree should you use? Also, as well as Dr Dale's Zombie Dictionary are there any other none survival books that you should read in order to prepare...

item.title: 4.05 Day-Glo & Dancing On Ice
item.description: World War Z, the colour of your house and Tattoos are all topics of conversation in the discussion this week as the team welcome Larry on board to help answer your burning questions. In the Challenge, the contestants are put through their paces in lycra on a trip to the Arctic. Who will die... er win... this week?
item.itunes:subtitle: World War Z, the colour of your house and Tattoos are all topics of conversation in the discussion this week as the team welcome Larry on board to help answer your burning questions. In the Challenge, the contestants are put through their paces in...

item.title: 4.04 Truffles & Treasure Hunt
item.description: How high can you pile the undead? Is there anything that can be used as a disguise to fool zombies? Will kryptonite help you survive the apocalypse? These are just some of the topics in today's discussion as the team are joined by Felicity to answer your questions. Plus our challenge takes the contestants on a helicopter ride to see if they can win a very special Treasure Hunt.
item.itunes:subtitle: How high can you pile the undead? Is there anything that can be used as a disguise to fool zombies? Will kryptonite help you survive the apocalypse? These are just some of the topics in today's discussion as the team are joined by Felicity to answer...

item.title: 4.03 Dead Stars & Deal or No Deal
item.description: Do zombies eat brains, the problem with wooden shoes, the need for correct grammer, schools or factories and a new religeon are all topics of conversation in 'The Discussion' this week as Tyler joins the team as a special guest challenger. Meanwhile in 'The Challenge' our contestants attempt to use their skill and tactics to beat the banker and open the most valuable box.
item.itunes:subtitle: Do zombies eat brains, the problem with wooden shoes, the need for correct grammer, schools or factories and a new religeon are all topics of conversation in 'The Discussion' this week as Tyler joins the team as a special guest challenger. Meanwhile...

item.title: 4.02 Ging Gang Goolie & Gladiators
item.description: How to survive or escape from a prison when the apocalypse begins and can fire be used to ward off the undead are just some of the topics on discussion today, as the regular team are joined by Animal Expert Christie. PLUS - The contestants begin to battle it out in the brand new Challenge Segment of the show to see which of the ten has what it takes to become the new fourth member of the premier team. This Week they take to the Gladiatorial Arena and try to beat The Eliminator!
item.itunes:subtitle: How to survive or escape from a prison when the apocalypse begins and can fire be used to ward off the undead are just some of the topics on discussion today, as the regular team are joined by Animal Expert Christie. PLUS - The contestants begin to...

item.title: 4.01 The Plan
item.description: Season Four is finally here! The 12 all new episodes begin with an explanation of where the team have been for the last 18 months, a recap on all your basic zombie training, discussions on the usefulness of security offices, organic matter and Celine Dion. Plus an introduction to : The Plan! An all new segment where the team begin the search for a brand new member to join the higher echelons of The School of Survival.
item.itunes:subtitle: Season Four is finally here! The 12 all new episodes begin with an explanation of where the team have been for the last 18 months, a recap on all your basic zombie training, discussions on the usefulness of security offices, organic matter and Celine...

item.title: 3.08 Roasted Puppy & Royal Weddings
item.description: It's the preperations for the Royal Wedding and a trip to the Graveyard for our intrepid team where they discover ways to deal with a variety of creatures, not just zombies....
item.itunes:subtitle: It's the preperations for the Royal Wedding and a trip to the Graveyard for our intrepid team where they discover ways to deal with a variety of creatures, not just zombies....

item.title: 3.07 Portaloos & Pegasus
item.description: Survival Tips from around the world takes our team to a remote island owned by Richard Attenborough with electrical fences and abandoned jeeps, meanwhile, questions in the discussion cover such diverse topics as mythical beasts, eye sight and proper pronunciation.
item.itunes:subtitle: Survival Tips from around the world takes our team to a remote island owned by Richard Attenborough with electrical fences and abandoned jeeps, meanwhile, questions in the discussion cover such diverse topics as mythical beasts, eye sight and proper...

item.title: 3.06 Hopscotch & Holy Hand Grenades
item.description: Questions this week about the best sports to partake in prior to the apocalypse in order to train and how would an average person cope in the apocalypse when securing their safehouse. Plus new rules on how to partake in the discussion and survival tips from around the world tests the resilience of a caravan.
item.itunes:subtitle: Questions this week about the best sports to partake in prior to the apocalypse in order to train and how would an average person cope in the apocalypse when securing their safehouse. Plus new rules on how to partake in the discussion and survival...

item.title: 3.05 Mummies & Marching Bands
item.description: The pros and cons of Brendan Fraser, building an arc, talk of weapons and a visit to the moon are all part of this weeks episode of How To Survive A Zombie Apocalypse.
item.itunes:subtitle: The pros and cons of Brendan Fraser, building an arc, talk of weapons and a visit to the moon are all part of this weeks episode of How To Survive A Zombie Apocalypse.

item.title: 3.04 Flailing tube men & Fireworks
item.description: The team discover the positive aspects that Belgium has to offer in Survival Tips from Around the World and in the discussion we discover the best battery operated items to use as weapons, what would distract the undead, what to get your mum on mother's day to help her survive and the sad tale of the boy called Kevin is told for all to hear.
item.itunes:subtitle: The team discover the positive aspects that Belgium has to offer in Survival Tips from Around the World and in the discussion we discover the best battery operated items to use as weapons, what would distract the undead, what to get your mum on...

item.title: 3.03 Lion Grids & Panther Flaps
item.description: Is A Safari Park better than a Zoo for survival? What is the best location in your house to make your safe room and who is the best person in the School of Survival to take with you when the zombie apocalypse occurs are some of the questions answered in todays discussion and a trip to Mexico helps the team discover which musical instrument would make the best weapon in Survival Around the World.
item.itunes:subtitle: Is A Safari Park better than a Zoo for survival? What is the best location in your house to make your safe room and who is the best person in the School of Survival to take with you when the zombie apocalypse occurs are some of the questions answered...

item.title: 3.02 Submachine Guns & Snow
item.description: The team answer questions on the best kind of guns to use, whether it's possible to train zombies and which would be their superpower of choice come the apocalypse. They also travel to a colder climate to discover how best to survive if you were trapped in Arctic conditions.
item.itunes:subtitle: The team answer questions on the best kind of guns to use, whether it's possible to train zombies and which would be their superpower of choice come the apocalypse. They also travel to a colder climate to discover how best to survive if you were...

item.title: 3.01 - Beehives & Burken Hair
item.description: The First Episode of Season 3 sees the team recapping on all the basics of zombie survival, telling tales on what they've been up to in their down time and a brand new weekly segment of 'Survival Around The World' helps us discover how best to survive in France.
item.itunes:subtitle: The First Episode of Season 3 sees the team recapping on all the basics of zombie survival, telling tales on what they've been up to in their down time and a brand new weekly segment of 'Survival Around The World' helps us discover how best to survive...

item.title: 2.11 Loch Ness
item.description: Whilst in Scotland at the Edinburgh Fringe, the team decide to try out the merits of surviving on a boat when the apocalypse hits. Maybe they should have chosen a different Loch though...
item.itunes:subtitle: Whilst in Scotland at the Edinburgh Fringe, the team decide to try out the merits of surviving on a boat when the apocalypse hits. Maybe they should have chosen a different Loch though...

item.title: 2.10 Weapons Special
item.description: Don't have any guns? Then what are the best household items to use as weapons in a zombie apocalypse? The team search a regular home to find the answers and on the way discover a useful way to convert a fridge and something unexpected in the basement.
item.itunes:subtitle: Don't have any guns? Then what are the best household items to use as weapons in a zombie apocalypse? The team search a regular home to find the answers and on the way discover a useful way to convert a fridge and something unexpected in the basement.

item.title: 2.9 The Cloning Device - Part Two
item.description: Will Dr Dale and the team be able to survive what came out of the cloning device? Find out in part two of the aptly titled 'The Cloning Device Part Two'
item.itunes:subtitle: Will Dr Dale and the team be able to survive what came out of the cloning device? Find out in part two of the aptly titled 'The Cloning Device Part Two'

item.title: 2.8 The Cloning Device - Part One
item.description: Something goes horribly wrong in the lab when Judy's cloning device gets mixed up with Tristen's bodily fluids. What will come out of the machine and will the team ever survive it?
item.itunes:subtitle: Something goes horribly wrong in the lab when Judy's cloning device gets mixed up with Tristen's bodily fluids. What will come out of the machine and will the team ever survive it?

item.title: 2.7 The Motorcycle Stunt
item.description: what could be worse than being faced with a zombie? Being faced with a zombie wearing protective headgear so that you can't destroy it, that's what. The team get together to discover how best to deal with such a situation.
item.itunes:subtitle: what could be worse than being faced with a zombie? Being faced with a zombie wearing protective headgear so that you can't destroy it, that's what. The team get together to discover how best to deal with such a situation.

item.title: 2.6 The Wedding
item.description: It can be the most special day of your life, but what would happen if a bride became of zombie at her wedding? Donald shows his acting skills and Judy displays her prowess on the organ as the team attempt to find out.
item.itunes:subtitle: It can be the most special day of your life, but what would happen if a bride became of zombie at her wedding? Donald shows his acting skills and Judy displays her prowess on the organ as the team attempt to find out.

item.title: 2.5 Climate Simulator
item.description: Back in the Simulation Machine the team discover that survival techniques will differ from climate to climate, and dependant on where you are in the world really does depend on how well you'll survive.
item.itunes:subtitle: Back in the Simulation Machine the team discover that survival techniques will differ from climate to climate, and dependant on where you are in the world really does depend on how well you'll survive.

item.title: 2.4 Response Training
item.description: How fast would you respond if the zombie apocalypse broke out? That's the question that is put to the test in today's simulation as Tristen attempts to dodge a bullet... literally.
item.itunes:subtitle: How fast would you respond if the zombie apocalypse broke out? That's the question that is put to the test in today's simulation as Tristen attempts to dodge a bullet... literally.

item.title: 2.3 The Speed Test
item.description: Outside on the School of Survival Car Park, the team attempt to answer the question of what is the optimum speed and vehicle to hit and destroy a zombie. Unfortunately they hit 88mph....
item.itunes:subtitle: Outside on the School of Survival Car Park, the team attempt to answer the question of what is the optimum speed and vehicle to hit and destroy a zombie. Unfortunately they hit 88mph....

item.title: 2.2 Trapped!
item.description: Having adjusted the Simulation Machine's sound effects module to work on voice command, the team set about discovering how one would best escape from a single room if zombies are massed outside.
item.itunes:subtitle: Having adjusted the Simulation Machine's sound effects module to work on voice command, the team set about discovering how one would best escape from a single room if zombies are massed outside.

item.title: 2.1 - Zombies on a Plane
item.description:
Join the School of Survival for the first of their weekly simulations that began in season 2.

This week the gang test out the simulation machine by discovering how best to survive a zombie outbreak on an aeroplane during a commercial flight.
item.itunes:subtitle: The team simulate surviving an outbreak on a plane
